interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Mens Sea Facial Detox Facial Mask Sheet for Oily Skin- New Skincare - Blackhead, Pore Cleansing, Peel-off (Age under 35)
Review Date: 2020/01/22
Store: SeptCity
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'SeptCity', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Detoxifying', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '7.09 x 5.51 x 0.79 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '733424600616'}
Review Text: I was skeptical when I first opened the pouch for this mask and found a dry sheet that seemingly was just a paper towel with cut outs but when I followed the directions and soaked it in water for a minute it became thick and almost skin like. I suggest when you place it in water to soak it unfolded and flat if possible because I had just added water to the pouch and let it soak folded in that and it was difficult to unfold. The eye holes and mouth holes were a bit too small for me so I will likely cut the holes bigger before soaking next time. Overall it did hydrate my skin some but not to the point where I wouldn't need to use moisturizer as I still had some dry patches. I did not experience any redness from this and for the rest of the day my skin has felt tighter. I prefer the sheer masks that come pre mositened mostly because it saves me a step but it does do what it says it will do.
Review Title: Hydrates ok
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
ABOUT ME MediAnswer Collagen Firming Up Mask 4ea (1box) 25g - 77% Pure Collagen Extract Anti-Aging Total Care Facial Mask Sheet, Powerful Hydrating and Anti-Wrinkle Night Skin Care Samyang {'Brand': 'Samyang', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Anti-aging', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 6.3 x 0.9 inches; 0.88 Ounces'} Pros: I had noticeably firmer skin after one use. It was cold and relaxing.

Cons: The instructions on how to use are in Chinese. It's is a little difficult to position as the mask itself feels very much like slimy loose skin. My face turned red - but I do have very sensitive skin.

Overall I was happy with the tighter looking skin. You will definitely look like something out of a horror movie when you wear this face mask so don't wear it around small children (see picture). The eye holes and mouth holes were a bit too small for me so I will likely cut the holes bigger before soaking next time. Overall it did hydrate my skin some but not to the point where I wouldn't need to use moisturizer as I still had some dry patches. I did not experience any redness from this and for the rest of the day my skin has felt tighter. I prefer the sheer masks that come pre mositened mostly because it saves me a step but it does do what it says it will do. Hydrates ok
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Primary Interests:** The user is particularly interested in skincare, focusing on anti-aging products and hydrating solutions, while also exploring detoxifying masks due to a recent interaction.
- **Product Type Preference:** Prefers sheet masks for their convenience but has recently encountered a product that requires additional preparation, which may influence future preferences.
- **Skin Sensitivity:** Maintains sensitive skin, which remains a crucial factor in product choices. Notably experienced no redness after using a new product, suggesting a slight shift toward tolerating more diverse formulations.
- **Efficacy Focus:** Values products delivering noticeable results, such as hydration and tighter skin. However, still seeks additional moisture post-application, highlighting the importance of overall effectiveness.
- **Sensory Considerations:** Considers scent and texture significant, though recent experiences with product structure (dry sheet) have raised some concerns about usability.
- **Transparency and Ethics:** Continues to favor cruelty-free products, reflecting ongoing concern for ethical sourcing.
- **Instruction Clarity:** Values clear instructions, and recent experiences suggest a need for simple guidelines to enhance usability, especially with products requiring preparation.
- **Potential for Discomfort:** Remains sensitive to adverse reactions, appreciating products that avoid triggers for irritation.

Overall, the user exhibits an ongoing focus on effective, gentle skincare options aligned with their sensitive skin while maintaining an interest in ethical choices and user-friendly experiences.
